summary: A new compilation, One faction at a time...
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=dodgerblue]All Female armors will be Vanilla, CBBE, UNP, UNPB, and Bodyslide 2.0 compatible
All armors will require Advanced Armor Perk to craft
If you want guards to use these armors go to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50719/?]Gallery of Armor - Replacer Patch[/url][/color][/center]

[center][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49827-1-1389548588.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49827-1-1389557853.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/supporterimages/110/127788-1393681492.png[/img]
[url=http://www.gamespot.com/videos/top-5-skyrim-mods-of-the-week-dragon-nests-and-bab/2300-6421391/][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49827-1-1411833641.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][color=dodgerblue]Version 1.3a[/color]
Markarth is here
Fixed Savage Hunter Butt :)
Smaller Texture File Sizes[/center]

[center][color=dodgerblue]10 sets of armor are scheduled to be in this mod[/color]
Riften is on the drawing table.[/center]
